This class defines the behaviour of the AgentTest class to test the ChatBot.

C

ChatBot - Class in <Unnamed>
This class defines the behaviour of the ChatBot class, which inherits from VirtualAgent.
ChatBot(String, String) - Constructor for class ChatBot
Parameterized constructor to initialize the chatBotName into hostValues, and userName into userValues of a chatBot
ChatBot() - Constructor for class ChatBot
No-argument constructor which calls the parameterized constructor to intialize the ChatBot with "chatbot" as the chatBotName, and "user" as the userName

Accessor to return the value of the "name" key in userValues.

M

P

Parser - Class in <Unnamed>
This class defines the behaviour of the Parser class, which is used to parser an ArrayList of tokens into a final response.
Parser(ArrayList<TokenMatch>) - Constructor for class Parser
Parameterized constructor to initialize the matchesList ArrayList
parseTokens() - Method in class Parser
This method accepts nothing because it uses the private matchesList variable assigned in the constructor, and constructs a response based off of the tokens
printFull() - Method in class TokenMatch

Parameterized constructor to initialize the TokenDefinition properties.
tokenize() - Method in class Lexer
This method accepts nothing because it uses the private query variable assigned in the constructor, and breaks the query into tokens, which are returned in an ArrayList to the caller for further processing

This class defines the behaviour of the TokenMatch class, which is used for tokenization, and contains properties pertaining to the tokens.
